Gui client module documentation¶

gui_main_window.py¶

class gui_client.gui_main_window.ClientMainWindow(app, client_transport, database_client)¶

Class of the main user interaction window.

add_contact(new_contact)¶

Сontact adding method.

add_contact_dialog()¶

Open add contact dialog method

add_message_history(message)¶

Add message user in history

clear_edit_message()¶

Button handler - clear. Clears message input fields.

connection_lost()¶

Server signal loss processing slot.

del_contact_dialog()¶

Method for calling the delete contact window.

field_disable()¶

Blocking function, input field and send button are not active until a recipient is selected.

get_message(sender)¶

Slot handler of incoming messages. Asks the user if a message was received not from the current interlocutor. If necessary, change the interlocutor.

history_list_update()¶

Message history update method.

init_ui()¶

Downloading the window configuration from the designer and subscribing handlers.

make_connection_with_signals(transport_client_obj)¶

Signal connection method.

select_active_user()¶

Interlocutor selection method.

send_message()¶

Sending an message to the current user

set_active_user()¶

The method of activating chat with the interlocutor.

update_clients_list()¶

“Updating the contact list on the main window.

gui_start_dialog.py¶

class gui_client.gui_start_dialog.UserNameDialog(app)¶

Create window for entering login and password

gui_loading_dialog.py¶

class gui_client.gui_loading_dialog.LoadingWindow(app)¶

Window that shows the percentage of application load.

gui_add_contact.py¶

class gui_client.gui_add_contact.AddContactDialog(client_transport, database_client)¶

Create window for add new contact.

update_users_all()¶

The method of filling out the list of possible contacts. List all registered users with the exception of those already added to the contacts and himself.

class gui_client.gui_del_contact.DelContactDialog(client_transport, del_contact_name)¶
